Pneumatic High Vacuum Butterfly Valve

ZGIQ Series Pneumatic High Vacuum Butterfly Valve

Reliable and Efficient choice for controlling gas and fluid flow in vacuum applications

The ZGIQ pneumatic high vacuum butterfly valve operates by changing the direction of the air path through an electromagnetic reversing valve, controlling the actuator to drive the butterfly valve for opening and closing movements. It is used to connect or cut off the airflow in vacuum pipelines. It is suitable for clean air and non-corrosive gases as the working media. It can be equipped with a feedback signal device and an electrical valve positioner.

Designed for Excellent Flow Control: Our pneumatic high vacuum butterfly valves are crafted using advanced materials and cutting-edge technology. With their high vacuum sealing capability, they effectively prevent gas leakage, ensuring a reliable and secure vacuum environment.

Our valves boast excellent flow control capabilities, enabling rapid and efficient gas circulation. This enhances the overall efficiency of gas control processes, resulting in optimized system performance.

 We offer a range of valve types to cater to diverse needs. The ZGIQ type incorporates pneumatic operation, enabling automation and remote control. The GID type includes electric operation, providing convenient and efficient valve actuation. You can choose the type that best suits your specific requirements

High Sealing Performance For Vacuum  Applications

ZGIQ Pneumatic High Vacuum butterfly valve adopts advanced design and production techniques, providing excellent high vacuum sealing performance. It can achieve a high level of vacuum, effectively preventing gas leakage.

Excellent Flow Capability

Our pneumatic high vacuum butterfly valves have excellent flow capability, enabling quick gas circulation and improving gas control efficiency.

High-Temperature Resistance

The ZGIQ  pneumatic high vacuum butterfly valve is manufactured using high-temperature materials, enabling it to operate in high-temperature environments with strong adaptability.

Tech Specifications & Dimensions

Our pneumatic high vacuum butterfly valves come in different types. For tech professionals who demand uncompromising control and precision in their vacuum environments, Dazhong Valve's pneumatic high vacuum butterfly valves stand as the definitive answer.

Go beyond mere technology and experience the difference exceptional engineering and unwavering dedication to quality make
